GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
media: tw686x: Register the irq at the end of probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 33196a7ac6fa76c9f7a9b1953098b177edbdc6a2, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 704a84ccdbf19fdce9adfda0b936dfdcac52fa49. For more details please see the references link.
